dcterms:description: The StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge is a platform for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms in the context of the StarCraft II game, focusing on micromanagement tasks.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II

dcterms:creator: V. Mnih
K. Kavukcuoglu
D. Silver
A. Graves
Ioannis Antonoglou
Daan Wierstra
Martin A. Riedmiller
dcterms:description: A collection of Atari games used as benchmarks for evaluating deep reinforcement learning algorithms, focusing on learning to play games directly from raw pixels.
dcterms:title: Atari games

dcterms:creator: Mikayel Samvelyan
Tabish Rashid
C. S. D. Witt
Gregory Farquhar
Nantas Nardelli
Tim G. J. Rudner
Chia-Man Hung

dcterms:description: SMAC is a multi-agent testbed dedicated to solving Dec-POMDP problems, providing various scenarios for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: SMAC (StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge)
